Swastika Mukherjee | Biography | Age | Height | Wiki | Husband | Family

Bolly Reporter
7 months ago

Swastika Mukherjee (স্বস্তিকা মুখার্জী) is an Indian Bengali film actress. She is very well known in the Bengali movie for her acting performance. Furthermore, Swastika is one of the leading actresses in the Tollywood film industry.

Biography & Wiki

Swastika Mukherjee’s nickname is Swastika. She was born on 13 December 1980 in Kolkata, West Bengal, India. Hence, her current age is 39 years. Swastika’s Zodiac is Sagittarius.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Height in Centimeters163 cm

Weight in Pounds 128 lbs

Eye ColorDark Brown

Family Members

She is a very gorgeous actress who belongs to a Bengali film background family. Her father is actor Santu Mukherjee and mother names are Late. Gopa Mukherjee. Also, She has one sister named Ajopa Mukherjee. She has a daughter, named Anwesha from the marriage with Pramit Sen.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Swastika got married to Promit Sen in 1998. Swastika Mukherjee was 18 years old when she got married. After 2 years of marriage, they got separated. Swastika filed a cruelty charge against him.

She was in a serious relationship with Parambrata Chatterjee. Her ex-husband Promit Sen filed a charge against Parambrata for criminal adultery. Finally, Promit and Swastika separated in 2010. After that, she starts dating another famous Bengali actor Jeet.

Swastika Mukherjee filmography

First of all, Swastika Mukherjee made her film debut in 2001 with the title called Hemanter Pakhi. However, she has got her first role in the cinema industry as a lead in Mastan which was released in 2004. Also in 2004, she acted in Criminal with Prosenjit Chatterjee. Furthermore, In 2008, she acted in the super hit Bengali movie ‘Partner’ with Jeet. She appeared against Abir Chatterjee in Byomkesh Bakshi in 2010 which was directed by Anjan Dutt.

Swastika appeared in the movie ‘Ami Aar Amar Girlfriends’ with Parno Mittra and Raima Sen. She played a lead role in a web series Dupur Thakurpo. It was hugely criticized because of her bold acting. Also, she made her Bollywood movie debut with “Mumbai Cutting” in 2011.

Salary and Net Worth

Swastika asks for 2.5 lakh per movie. Furthermore, for a TV show Challenge Nibi Na, Swastika asked for Rs.1 Lakh per episode. Due to this, it was the highest among all-stars for that TV show.

Education and School, College

Swastika has completed her schooling from Carmel School, St. Teresa’s Secondary School and Gokhale Memorial School. Later on, she completed her Graduate degree from Jadavpur University, Kolkata.

  • In 2014 alleged Swastika suicide attempt.
  • Close friends and family members called her Bhebli.

  • Another incident, Swastika caught on CCTV cameras, stealing in a gold earring in her handbag in an elite jewelry shop in Singapore.
